basics.name: Gaetan Ferry
basics.label: Security Researcher
basics.summary: I am a security researcher with a particular appeal for application security. With a background in offensive security, I am at my happiest when breaking through all kinds of things.

work.summary: Researching and specifying security rules to feed the SAST engines of Sonar products.
Penetration tester and offensive security auditor position. Missions for a wide variety of customers and topics.
Web application security course for last year Master degree students.
Security analyst inside Intrinsec CERT. Research and development around malware analysis and threat intelligence.
highlights: Honeypot development, deployment, and data analysis.

publications.name: Juliet C# Benchmark and the SecureString case
publications.summary: Feedback post about the Juliet C# SAST benchmark suite with a study SecureString related test cases.

publications.name: CVE-2022-31813: Forwarding addresses is hard
publications.summary: Write-up about CVE-2022-31813, which exploits hop-by-hop headers handling in mod_proxy. Presentation of theoretical and real-world impacts.

publications.name: elFinder: The story of a repwning
publications.summary: Write-up about CVE-2020-26960 which bypasses a previous path traversal patch.

publications.name: Is it post quantum time yet?
publications.summary: High-level overview of post-quantum cryptography focusing on transition mechanisms.

publications.name: Kubernetes namespaces isolation - what it is, what it isn't, life, universe and everything
publications.summary: Presentation of Kubernetes namespaces isolation, its limits, and some attack scenarios.

publications.name: Don't fear the bark, ts_rewrite to dodge the mark
publications.summary: Bypassing F5 Big IP WAF SQL injection protection using the full-text search feature of PostreSQL.

publications.name: Pwning an outdated Kibana with not so sad vulnerabilities
publications.summary: Writeup about combining LFI and prototype pollution vulnerabilities to achieve remote code execution on Kibana.

publications.name: Attaquer un réseau Windows avec Responder
publications.summary: A short introduction on exploiting the multicast and broadcast name resolution mechanisms to start compromising a Windows Active Directory domain.

talks.name: AppSeco and Juliet C# (lightning talk)
talks.summary: A lightning talk about the Juliet C# project and its use for SAST engine benchmarking.

talks.name: Code Obfuscation 10**2+(2*a+3)%2
talks.summary: An introduction talk to code obfuscation focusing on classical techniques like CFG flattening or array indexing.

vulns.name: Remote Code Execution in Supermicro SuperDoctor5 before 5.14.0
vulns.summary: A remote code execution vulnerability in Supermicro Super Doctor 5 leveraging a log4j configuration tampering issue.

vulns.name: CVE-2022-31813
vulns.summary: X-Forwarded-* header creation bypass through hop-by-hop in Apache HTTPD.

vulns.name: CVE-2022-26960
vulns.summary: Directory traversal in std42 elFinder through 2.1.60.

vulns.name: Livebox 3 - Weak password reset procedure
vulns.summary: Password reset vulnerability on the Livebox 3 device from Orange.

vulns.name: CVE-2019-1591
vulns.summary: Cisco Nexus 9000 Series Shell Escape Vulnerability

vulns.name: CVE-2019-1588
vulns.summary: Cisco Nexus 9000 Series Arbitrary File Read Vulnerability

vulns.name: CYBONET – PineApp Mail Secure 5.1: Multiple vulnerabilities
vulns.summary: Code execution, SQL injection, unrestricted upload and restricted shell escape in PineApp Mail Secure email filtering software.
